Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides zero and low interest loans or loan interest rate reduction for energy improvement projects to stimulate the growth and development of small businesses
Summary: Provides zero and low interest loans or loan interest rate reduction for energy improvement projects to stimulate the growth and development of small businesses and jobs.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
LawCode: Add ยง16-bb, amd ยง16-m, UDC Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to creating the small business energy loan program
